definition: (idiom) thought-provoking/to give one food for thought

sentences.english: His approach is both innovative and thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 他的方法是创新的和令人深思的。

sentences.english: A more serious talk can begin with a quotation or a thoughtful question.
sentences.chinese: 较严肃的主题可由一句引言或引人深思的问题开始。

sentences.english: Yeah, I'll take it under advisement.
You must be thinking about your childhood.
sentences.chinese: 归乡的路上你深思不语，同乡说你一定是想起童年了。

sentences.english: What the chart reveals is indeed thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 图表揭示的内容确实令人深思。

sentences.english: In the selection the lecturer neglected the negligible negative reflection on the election.
sentences.chinese: 在全集结演讲者疏忽了对选举的眇乎小哉的扫兴深思。

sentences.english: Behind every overextended kid, there is a well-meaning parent.
sentences.chinese: 每个过度开发的孩子背后，总有一个深思远虑的家长。

sentences.english: She stared thoughtfully into the distance.
The circle seemed to portray the deliberations of the young man.
sentences.chinese: 绕圈子似乎在描绘年轻人的深思熟虑。

sentences.english: In this process, the consumer deliberates within himself before he finally makes a purchase move.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，消费者在最终采购前经过了深思熟虑。

sentences.english: Pondering on one hadith can exemplify this notion.
sentences.chinese: 可以以此观念为例深思一段圣训。

sentences.english: All are the sort of well-meaning and thoughtful films that the Academy likes best.
sentences.chinese: 全部是组委会最喜欢的那种善意的深思熟虑的电影。

sentences.english: This is all the problem to make us thinking deeply.
sentences.chinese: 这都是令我们深思的问题。

sentences.english: Yours is a prudent, well-considered audacity.
sentences.chinese: 而是经过慎重的深思熟虑。

definition: to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
(idiom) thought-provoking/to give one food for thought
to think sth through/to consider carefully
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to reflect upon oneself/to examine one's conscience/to question oneself/to search one's soul
